name: Vegan Gingerbread Cookies with Soy Milk
author: jessicake
summary: These ginger cookies are made with soy milk and are surrounded by sugar.
ingredients: ⅔ cup vegan shortening (such as Crisco® All-Vegetable Shortening)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix shortening, brown sugar, white sugar, and soy milk together in a bowl using an electric mixer
Add molasses and blend until smooth
Combine flour, ginger, baking soda, baking powder, and cinnamon in a separate bowl
Pour into the bowl with the shortening mixture; mix dough by hand until thoroughly combined
Pour 1/3 cup sugar into a shallow bowl
Roll dough into balls and roll in sugar to coat
Place on the prepared baking sheets about 1 inch apart and flatten slightly
Bake in the preheated oven until golden and set, 12 to 14 minutes
Let cookies cool completely on the baking sheet
